Not my best photoshoot ever but I was impatient lol! Finally fully finished my Nightbook sweater designed by @unwind_knitwear 

I decided to do a 3 color fade on the design and I'm really happy with how it came out

Navy blue foundation yarn is @neighborhoodfiberco in Reservoir Hill; fade yarns are @spunrightround in Right Meow, @deliriumfiberarts in Neon Purple Mist, and @sockobsessionyarns in Maleficent's Manifesto

Another fantastic Wales interactive game, nightbook gives a very interesting and somewhat creepy story. Basically divided into two different main stories (I prefer the book sale but both good), the acting is terrific especially from the main actress. My only complaint is the endings - itâ€™s nice to have so many, but itâ€™s so hard to remember what youâ€™ve tried before so that you can see the rest. Iâ€™m up to 13 done but running out of ideas, hopefully someone makes a guide #beatengame #walesinteractive #nightbook #ps4

My beautiful daughter, Freyja, in her Nightbook ğŸ–¤

Freyja has been patiently waiting for me to knit this for her through all of my tests this year ğŸ˜… Every time she saw me cast on another, sheâ€™d give me the biggest eye roll, lol! I ended up powering through it to get in finished as an early birthday present. She turns 12 on the 11th! We are both going to wear our Nightbooks to a very special concert on her birthday weekend and we canâ€™t wait! 

Pattern: Nightbook by @unwind_knitwear (this is my favorite pattern of all time - such a perfect thing to knit and wear)

Yarn: MC - Underworld from @treehouseknits CC - Woodland from @explorerknits (she chose her colors and I think she nailed it!)

Modification details can be found on my ravelry project page. I knit the size XS (what a treat for this plus size knitter!) with a few mods for length in the body and sleeves.

Day 24 of #31daysinthecrypt hosted by @king_lizzard and @_lachrymal 

Hereâ€™s 4 random horror games I havenâ€™t posted yet for PS4 and some of my thoughts about them 

1. Alien Isolation - I havenâ€™t played this yet. Iâ€™ve only seen the first Alien movie which I loved. I heard this game is super scary so Iâ€™m looking forward to it when I have time

2. Until Dawn - I finished this game and got the platinum trophy using a guide. I love how the choices make a big difference in the outcome, where the main characters can die if the wrong choices are made. I enjoyed this game so much, but played the beginning of the first two Dark Pictures games by the same developer (Supermassive Games) and couldnâ€™t get into those. I still want to try Supermassiveâ€™s latest game The Quarry when I can get it on a good sale

3. Tormented Souls - I saw @_lachrymal â€˜s post about this and decided to buy it since itâ€™s inspired by and plays similar to the classic survival horror games that I love such as Resident Evil and Silent Hill. I tried it out the other day and solved the puzzle to get out the first room and was wandering around some dark hallways but didnâ€™t encounter any enemies yet. The puzzles seem really tough to me so Iâ€™m going to use a guide when I play this, and I think that will make it more enjoyable for me 

4. Nightbook - this is an FMV game I ordered from LRG about someone who summons a demon into their house. I was playing this while I was talking with friends online so really wasnâ€™t focused on it, and it played through itself and made choices for me and I didnâ€™t retain most of it, so I need to play it again ğŸ˜†

Only 1 more week left until Halloween ğŸƒğŸ‘» I hope you have a good week leading up to that ! âœ¨ğŸ’–âœ¨

Itâ€™s been a hot minute since I updated on my Nightbook sweater. Itâ€™s off the needles and blocked!!! Just in time for the first freeze of the season too. I will admit fully that the colorwork was a complete dream! I did have to force myself through the ribbing on the body. I love the look but it seemed to take forever. A un niÃ±o le darÃ­a alas, pero dejarÃ­a que el solo aprendiese a volar.
A los viejo, a mis viejos, les enseÃ±arÃ­a que la muerte no llega con la vejez sino con el olvido. 

Tantas cosas les he aprendido a ustedes los hombres...
He aprendido que todo el mundo quiere vivir en la cima de la montaÃ±a sin saber que la verdadera felicidad estÃ¡ en la forma de subir la escampada.

He aprendido que cuando un reciÃ©n nacido aprieta con su puÃ±o por primera vez el dedo de su padre, lo tiene atrapado para siempre.

He aprendido que un hombre tiene derecho de mirar a otro hombre hacia abajo Ãºnicamente cuando ha de ser para ayudarle a levantarse.

Son tantas cosa las que he aprendido, pero finalmente de mucho no habrÃ¡ de servir porque cuando me guarden dentro de esta maleta, infelizmente me estarÃ© muriendo.
